# UITextAlternativeStyle.none

**Case**

A constant that indicates that the text input shouldn’t highlight alternatives because the input text is expected to be correct.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **UITextAlternativeStyle.lowConfidence**: A constant that indicates that the text input should highlight alternatives because the input text may be incorrect.

items.description: A constant that indicates that the text input should highlight alternatives because the input text may be incorrect.
items.name: UITextAlternativeStyle.lowConfidence
